turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. The bf and I are feeling like it's a pizza kind of night. Can you help me order a couple from Domino's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What are you in the mood for? A specialty?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two pizzas and a dessert. I think we're going to build our own this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let's start with the two custom pizzas. Size? Extra or half on anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large on the pizzas, regular sauce and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any special sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the regular tomato, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you have in mind for toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me what meats are available? I always forget!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get ham, beef, salami, pepperoni, italian sausage, premium chicken, bacon, and philly steak.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go philly steak, bacon, and premium chicken on one of the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ham, pineapple, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Spicing it up a bit tonight, I see. Do you want any of those light and/or extra?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra ham, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can do! Do you want any sauce with those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And your dessert? They have cinnamon bread twists, a marbled cookie brownie, and chocolate lava cake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One chocolate lava cake sounds good. It comes with two right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's right. Any icing sides with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, I think we're all good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That brings your order to 23.97. You qualified for a pickup discount of $15 on the pizzas, and there was a small upcharge for the extra ham. Sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza order is now complete. It will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime!
